review: I was having earache n I went to some other doctor first...but my earache worsened....n when I visited that doc again mentioning that my earache is getting wrst n he said its much better according to him n acted like I was just lying n then my sister suggested about Dr pradeep n I visited him once n within that night my earache got much better n I will advise everyone to choose your doctor wise

Usual procedure adopted need to wait for the turn, no discount or concession all charges applied including registration etc .Dont know why we need to go through practo what benefit we will get, it was a normal opd services.

******** ********* ** *** ** * ***** **** ********* we came to the Reception at 1.50 pm against an appointment at 1.30pm…I was circling around the entire hospital for parking for 10 min and then he sits in a diff building it seems…to our utter shock the receptionist told us that he has moved out without giving us any prior notice… thoroughly unprofessional and that too in a place like Apollo ***** *** *** **** ***** ****** *** big brand name…Rubbish experience** ***** *** **** ******* *** ************ **** * ***** ******
Will never recommend **** * ****** **** **** *** ***** ******
